Description: A next generation platform, Delivering the modern, conversational enterprises

3.    Experience in developing and training machine learning models.

4.    Practical application of prompt engineering techniques.

5.    Basic statistical analysis of results to support ongoing model improvements.

6.    Utilization of transformers for classification algorithms, NER, reranking etc.
